scripts.build: mkdir -p build && bun build ./src/index.ts --compile --outfile build/claudecodeui && cp .env.example build/
scripts.build:linux: mkdir -p build && bun build ./src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile build/claudecodeui-linux && cp .env.example build/
scripts.build:macos: mkdir -p build && bun build ./src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile build/claudecodeui-macos && cp .env.example build/
scripts.build:macos-arm: mkdir -p build && bun build ./src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile build/claudecodeui-macos-arm64 && cp .env.example build/
scripts.build:windows: mkdir -p build && bun build ./src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile build/claudecodeui.exe && cp .env.example build/
scripts.build:all: bun run build:linux && bun run build:macos && bun run build:macos-arm && bun run build:windows
